segments.text: I want to send some money to Australia . Could you handle it for me ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , madam , how much would you like to remit ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Which would you like to remit , by mail or by cable ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What is the difference between them ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The cable will take less time for your account , in the meantime , the regular service charge is also higher than that of the mail one .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , I think the cable is better .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK , please fill in the application form giving the name and address of beneficiary , your name and telephone .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Everything is OK . The commission is 50 yuan .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Here you are . Thanks a lot .
segments.speaker: S1
